metadata.title: CVE-2020-11825 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Dolibarr 10.0.6, forms are protected with a CSRF token against CSRFattacks. The problem is any CSRF token in any user's session can be used inanother user's session. CSRF tokens should not be valid in this situation.

criterions.comment: dolibarr: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
